ygData.subject: Re: Make research fun
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah , What is up with the library at Erudin ? I have been in there several times - but no books. How am I supposed to do the reaserch ? Do I like need the
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah ,
What is up with the library at Erudin ?
I have been in there several times - but no books.
How am I supposed to do the reaserch ?

Do I like need the card and metioned below and must I
give it to someone ? Like Toll Nicealot which
has never been nice to me ?


--- Joe Wallace <joew88@...> wrote:
> From: "Joe Wallace" <joew88@...>
>
> Do you need something special to get into the
> Library at Erudin? I've never
> been there, but I ask because I was near Qeynos one
> time and a guard walked
> by me, and he said "My! Did I just drop something?"
> And he walked on. I
> looked and found what looks like a library card,
> marked Library of Erudin.
> Is this a quest item? Or do you need a card to
> visit the library?
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Jay Hollums <jhollums@...>
> To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 7:41 AM
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Make research fun
>
>
> > From: "Jay Hollums" <jhollums@...>
> >
> > Erudin Erudin Erudin.... click your heels together
> 3 times as well... and
> > poof you wont be in Kansas any more...[look to the
> library]
> >
> > Rutreeii
> > Cazic-Thul
> >
>
>
>
